# Disable warnings for all dependencies

SET(BUILD_TESTING OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

DISABLE_WARNINGS()

SET(EASTL_BUILD_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("eastl")
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("eastl/test")

ADD_LIBRARY(eastl INTERFACE)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(eastl INTERFACE EASTL EAAssert EAStdC EAMain EATest EAThread)
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(eastl INTERFACE "eastl/include")

SET(GLFW_BUILD_DOCS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
SET(GLFW_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
SET(GLFW_BUILD_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("glfw")

ADD_LIBRARY(glm INTERFACE)
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(glm INTERFACE "glm")

IF (SNUFF_OGL)
  ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("glad")
  SET_SOLUTION_FOLDER(
    "deps/glad"
    glad
  )
ENDIF (SNUFF_OGL)

IF (SNUFF_DUKTAPE)
  ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("duktape-2.2.0")
  SET_SOLUTION_FOLDER(
    "deps/duktape"
    duktape
  )
ENDIF (SNUFF_DUKTAPE)

IF (NOT SNUFF_NSCRIPTING)
  ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("header-parser")
  
  SET_SOLUTION_FOLDER(
    "deps/header-parser"
    header-parser
  )
ENDIF (NOT SNUFF_NSCRIPTING)

ADD_LIBRARY(rapidjson INTERFACE)
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(rapidjson INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/rapidjson/include")

SET(ENABLE_GLSLANG_BINARIES OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("glslang")
ADD_LIBRARY(glslang-lib INTERFACE)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(glslang-lib INTERFACE
  glslang
  HLSL
  OSDependent
  OGLCompiler
  SPIRV
)

SET(SPIRV_CROSS_CLI OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
SET(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_C_API OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
SET(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_MSL OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
SET(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_REFLECT OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
SET(SPIRV_CROSS_ENABLE_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
SET(SPIRV_CROSS_SKIP_INSTALL ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("spirv-cross")
ADD_LIBRARY(spirv-cross-lib INTERFACE)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(spirv-cross-lib INTERFACE 
  spirv-cross-core 
  spirv-cross-cpp 
  spirv-cross-util 
  spirv-cross-hlsl 
  spirv-cross-glsl
)

ADD_LIBRARY(tinygltf INTERFACE)
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(tinygltf INTERFACE "tinygltf")

SET_SOLUTION_FOLDER(
  "deps/eastl"
  EASTL
  EAAssert
  EAMain
  EAStdC
  EASTLTest
  EATest
  EAThread
)

SET_SOLUTION_FOLDER(
  "deps/glfw3"
  glfw
  uninstall
)

SET_SOLUTION_FOLDER(
  "deps/glslang"
  glslang
  OGLCompiler
  OSDependent
  SPIRV
  SPVRemapper
  HLSL
)

SET_SOLUTION_FOLDER(
  "deps/spirv-cross"
  spirv-cross-core
  spirv-cross-cpp
  spirv-cross-glsl
  spirv-cross-hlsl
  spirv-cross-util
)

RESTORE_WARNINGS()
